subject: TypeError: Router.use() requires middleware function but got a Object
details: I made the inded but I get this error when I run nodemon: TypeError: Router.use() requires middleware function but got a Object. It goes away if I comment out the connection to the controller.

answers.answer: Oh, you have to export the controller or else it won't know what you're connecting to.
answers.name: Ali
